Question
========

Below is a table showing the probabilities that three people A, B and C will still be alive in 30 years.

  --------- ----- ----- ----- Person *A* *B* *C* Odds 0.4 0.5 0.3 --------- ----- ----- -----

Then what is the probability that they will all be alive in 30 years?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,06
* 0,3
* 0,12
* 0,18

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.06: Correct
* 0.3: Incorrect
* 0.12: Incorrect
* 0.18: Incorrect
